arts.ttl: Clinical Atletico thrash eliminated Salzburg to reach last 16
arts.sum: Watch highlights as a brace from Antoine Griezmann and goal from Giuliano Simeone, son of manager Diego leads Atletico Madrid to automatic qualification for the last-16 of the Champions League in a 4-1 thrashing at already eliminated RB Salzburg.

arts.ttl: Simeone, Atlético ‘ready for anyone’ after Salzburg victory seals last 16 progress
arts.sum: He went on to add that “we started in a bad way in the Champions League, the team had an incredible and very important reaction, all incredible merit of the players. Speaking after the victory on a complicated next round, which could feature Real Madrid, Manchester City, Bayern Munich or Celtic, he reflected that, “since we have been in the Champions League, we have always faced important rivals, we could not imagine any other situation than meeting any important team in the competition”.

arts.ttl: Champions League knockout draw: Date, possible fixtures, format, bracket
arts.sum: The draw for the knockout playoff round of the new-look UEFA Champions League is upon us. Here's when it takes place and how it works.

arts.ttl: Atlético Madrid facing up to likely draw with one of Europe’s top clubs in UCL Last-16
arts.sum: La Liga giants Atlético Madrid have not been at all rewarded for their efforts in securing a top-8 place in the Champions League. This comes amid confirmation that Diego Simeone’s…

arts.ttl: BREAKING: Champions League play-offs and knockout bracket as Premier League quartet learn fate
arts.sum: All 36 teams competing in this year's new-look Champions League played their final league fixture, with some banking a play-off place and others moving through to the Round of 16

arts.ttl: Champions League final group games: join us for updates on all 18 matches – live
arts.sum: Updates from a tantalising final round of games Manchester City v Club Brugge – live updates Live scoreboard | Who needs what | Email Scott Welcome to chaos. There are 36 clubs playing 18 fixtures to determine which eight qualify automatically for the Round of 16 and which 16 go into the play-off round. Here are those fixtures … Aston Villa v Celtic Barcelona v Atalanta Bayer Leverkusen v Sparta Prague Bayern Munich v Slovan Bratislava Borussia Dortmund v Shakhtar Donetsk Brest v Real Madrid Dinamo Zagreb v AC Milan Girona v Arsenal Internazionale v Monaco Juventus v Benfica Lille v Feyenoord Manchester City v Club Brugge PSV v Liverpool Red Bull Salzburg v Atletico Madrid Sporting v Bologna Sturm Graz v RB Leipzig Stuttgart v Paris Saint-Germain Young Boys v Red Star Belgrade Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid chief defends referees amid Florentino Perez allegations
arts.sum: This week, there has been controversy surrounding Real Madrid president Florentino Perez, following revelations made by Rafael Louzan, who is the new president of the Spanish Football Federation. According to Louzan, Perez pulled him aside during the Spanish Super Cup in 2024 to discuss referees, during which he asked to “resolve the matter”. This story […] The post Atletico Madrid chief defends referees amid Florentino Perez allegations appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Champions League permuations as Liverpool, Arsenal, Man City and Aston Villa face decisive matches
arts.sum: The final fixtures of the group stage of the 2025 Champions League take place on Wednesday evening and with every side set to be in action throughout the evening, plenty could still happen

arts.ttl: Simeone & De Paul focused on Salzburg amid top-eight hopes in Champions League
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid put forward coach Diego Simeone and midfielder Rodrigo de Paul on media duties in Austria ahead of Wednesday night’s fixture against Red Bull Salzburg in the finale of the group stage of the Champions League . Salzburg is a young team, with enthusiasm, that will start the league at the weekend and will want to arrive in the best way as well as close the Champions League at home and we are focused only on tomorrow’s game.

arts.ttl: Preview: Red Bull Salzburg vs. Atletico Madrid - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's Champions League clash between Red Bull Salzburg and Atletico Madrid, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
